about_the_game:
Decorate your arsenal with emblems of your enemy’s demise with the Skull & Bones DLC pack, containing two spine-chilling weapon skins. Usable on all in-game guns, let your armoury reflect the darkness deep within.

Features:
  • Skull Crusher (weapon skin)
  • Wall of Bones (weapon skin)

Weapon skins are usable across all in-game gun models. Requires Sniper Ghost Warrior Contracts 2 base game.
